topics.body:
So lemme tell ya'll what just happened to me.
I was cleaning up the kitchen while my iPhone was playing random songs (assorted dubstep and OSTs). As a song ended, I heard buzzing come from a window. I look up to find one of these monsters.
!http://static.guim.co.uk/sys-images/Guardian/Pix/pictures/2009/8/18/1250613627130/wasp-notes-and-queries-001.jpg!
As I stood there, the next song started. As I started this wasp down, I shit you not, all I heard was a heavy metal opening and then [spoiler]"'SUN SUN SUN...'":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=chPJ7x9iMw0&feature=player_embedded#at=66 [/spoiler]

Unfortunately it then flew out of the window. Epic battle cancelled.

topics.body:
My reaction to watching Deadmans Wonderland today for the first time:

!http://img.pandawhale.com/post-31463-Clint-Eastwood-crying-gif-crin-JLWO.gif!
This show is fucking brutal. I got to episode 5.

So far I'm enjoying it though, it's a interesting show but still, I haven't seen a show that makes me squeamish like this in awhile. 

_*Especially episode 5*_
